response.en: The boss said treat me as a key personnel
response.zh: 老板说把我当作关键人物

response.en: The rest of you don't need to
response.zh: 你们其他人不用这样做

response.en: They also found the other area troublesome
response.zh: 他们还觉得另一个区域麻烦
response.ar: وجدوا أيضًا أن المنطقة الأخرى مزعجة

response.en: Directly integrated me into their family
response.zh: 直接把我融入了他们的家庭
